Bibliography

The bibliography below is simply a list of the works cited in this book. There is a much larger body of historiography on Jacobitism which should be consulted by students interested in pursuing the subject further, and a regularly updated, near comprehensive, bibliography of Jacobitism can be found on the Jacobite Studies Trust website: www.jacobitestudiestrust.org.
